definition: abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

pinyin: wan4 wei2 wang3 lian2 he2 ti3

sentences.english: On the modern World Wide Web, most pages are no longer hand-coded.
sentences.chinese: 在現代萬維網中，大多數頁面都不再用手動編碼。

sentences.english: Why wasn’t the Web colonized by monopolists a decade ago?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼萬維網沒有在十年前就被壟斷？

sentences.english: This recognition is the foundation of Web evolution research.
sentences.chinese: 這一認識是萬維網進化研究的基礎。

sentences.english: Everything has a beginning, so does World Wide Web.
sentences.chinese: 每個事物都有其開端，萬維網也是如此。

sentences.english: 1990 - The World Wide Web first began.
By aggregating material, you are editing the web for your readers.
sentences.chinese: 通過把材料聚合起來，你在爲你的讀者編輯萬維網。

sentences.english: Without them, WWW may be still a primordial information sea.
sentences.chinese: 沒有這項技術，萬維網將只是一個原始的信息的海洋。

sentences.english: You described Linked Data as a sea change akin to the invention of the WWW itself - i.e. we've gone from a Web of documents to a Web of data.
sentences.chinese: 你認爲關聯數據像萬維網的發明那麼重要。

sentences.english: The bounty of the World Wide Web encourages niche interests.
sentences.chinese: 萬維網的慷慨支持了利基利益。

sentences.english: But the Web is a different matter.
sentences.chinese: 但是萬維網就是不同的東西。

sentences.english: How did the Web grow from nothing to the scale it is at today?
sentences.chinese: 萬維網是如何從無到有發展成今天的規模的？

sentences.english: The World Wide Web is the largest single information resource humanity has ever produced.
sentences.chinese: 萬維網是人類迄今爲止所提供的一個最大的信息資源。

sentences.english: For example, the Web could provide information leading to better health care.
sentences.chinese: 比如說，萬維網能爲獲得更好的醫療保健提供信息。

sentences.english: Fineindex - World-wide web directory based on the Open Directory Project.
sentences.chinese: 萬維網目錄基於開的目錄工程。
